name: Candy Knight
description:
STORY

The Candy Kingdom is under attack! Get ready for the colourful battle. Use your tactful skills and wisdom to defend your land. Collect candies and recruit the knights to save your kingdom!

GAMEPlAY

Collect falling candies with your mine car. Enemies will come at night, sent out knights to repel the attack! Each knight has his own ability, you need to make good use of your candy resources and select a good strategy to save your kingdom!

by @yonzliu
